products.title: Harewood Plain Orange Vertical Blind
products.description: Our harewood plain is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With its seductive colour palette and attractive prices harewood is one of their bestselling plain ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. Free delivery on all harewood plain orange vertical blinds over 145 from leading suppliers kingston blinds direct.

products.title: Harewood Blackout Orange Vertical Blind
products.description: Our harewood blackout is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With the added benefit of its colour matched blackout backing and attractive prices harewood blackout is one of their bestselling blackout ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. Ideal for use throughout the home, the harewood blackout orange vertical blind comes with free delivery on orders over 145 at kingston blinds direct.

products.title: Splash Tango Vertical Blind
products.description: This slightly textured, dim-out fabric will bring a splash of colour to an interior. Available in many colours and blackout options available in the bella range. Splash tango vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Bella Tango Vertical Blind
products.description: A lightly textured blackout fabric available in a range of colours. Dim out options available in the splash range. Bella tango vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
